info.description:
Welcome to the spa
You are here to eat or be eaten.
This is a spa for people with skill in vore, unbirth, or breast vore
Before you enter you must follow these rules
1. No scat or piss
2. Vore is allowed but no M/M
3. No CockVore
4. Chapters must be at least a pharagraph long, unless it is a question of what path to help set the stroy
5. Prey may be willing or unwilling
6. No random unbirth or vore spree. They must follow some form of plot.
7. People with animal ear or tails are allowed but no full blown furries. They must also be female
8. Creatures with their top half female and the lower half something else are allowed(i.e nagas, centaurs, mermaids)
9. Sprits like ghost, faires, dyraids, or elemental goddeses are allowed
10. Please don't let the story end at the digetion of the prey. Move to the pred's life when you are done for.
11. No racial slurs
12. No building a full house in some ones womb (see this happen one to many times)
follow the rules and let the fun begin
